summary: Five young people are involved in a serious car accident that leaves four of them dead. Isabel, the youngest, is the only survivor and helps her four friends realize they have passed on.
cast: Julia Volpato|Pablo Sigal|Macarena del Corro|Diego Vegezzi|Tomas Mackinlay
keywords: tracking shot|kurt cobain|reference to michelangelo antonioni|minimalism|death
title: Leones
